case.state: Um, hello. Is this the right place for the game...?
W-We're starting already? B-But I completely forgot to introduce myself!
Does someone like me deserve something this nice?
I-It feels a bit odd to not exchange anything... Like I'm not participating.
J-Just the one... I-If it's not a bother.
W-Will just one be enough...?
Um, if it's alright with you, could I have ~cards~ cards, please?
Um, You can give me whatever cards you want. I-I don't mind.
B-But which ones should I take?
I-Is it really okay for me to receive something s-so valuable?
It's been a while since anyone gave me something so... so nice!
Um, I'll try hard not to waste these good cards you gave me, dealer!
I'm terribly sorry for making you think about me. But... thank you.
E-Even if they're just cards... getting something like this makes me f-feel happy.
I-I'm so happy! This is what I needed right now.
Hehe... I-I'm not sure what I did to make you think of me... B-But thank you...
Wow... I-I don't know what to say... T-Thank you.
Sometimes... being average isn't so bad.
T-These don't really stand out. B-But that doesn't bother me...
T-These aren't really the best. B-But I don't think they're the worst either... Maybe?
I...I'm not really sure what to do with this.
I-Is it okay to ask for help? N-Never mind, I-I guess that wouldn't be fair.
I'm not really good at games, so I don't know how to use cards like these...
Oh no...
I-I know someone like me has no right to say this. But if it were possible, I'd want a different hand...
I-I've been talking about myself so much... D-Do none of you really mind?
Is there no hope for me t-this time...?
Wait, I'm not ready! I-I-I dropped my cards!
Ahh! D-Did you give me these b-because you're mad at me?
(No one's doing anything to me here... Do they hate me? Or not care about me?)
Ahh! Oh no no no no...!
C-Children!? N-No... I-I'm definitely not ready yet... sorry.
N-No... I don't think I'm ready for children... But maybe if I found the right person...
N-No. I'm pretty slow, so I'm not very good at sports...
I-I'm not really good at much besides nursing... sorry.
Y-You could try visiting Hope's Peak Academy. I-It's the most interesting place I've ever gone to.
I-I'm sorry... I don't go to very many places. M-Maybe you try visiting Hope's Peak academy? I-It's where I go to school. A-And, um, it's definitely interesting.
Always remember to thoroughly apply sunscreen when on the beach. If you need help, it's always acceptable to ask someone to apply it for you!
I-I think... something really important happened to me in a place like this. B-But I really can't remember what!
I-I never liked winter... p-people get sick more. A-And I always trip more. B-But this place is nice...
I-I always loved Christmas movies as a kid. E-Everyone in them always looked so happy!
L-Libraries are nice... When I run into a library, a-anybody chasing me just gives up. A-And nobody picks on me either.
T-There are so many nice things to read in a library. I-I've always enjoyed technical books, l-like medical encyclopedias. B-But horror novels are also nice.
U-Um, are you sure it's safe to play in a place like this? I-I wouldn't want to trip and damage anything.
T-The owners of this mansion would probably get really mad if I broke something! I-I'll have to be extra careful!
W-Wait... W-Whose room is this. I-Is it yours, ~player~?
D-Did you invite me to your room to play strip poker, ~player~? I-I don't know if I'm ready for a step forward like that!
W-W-Why would you bring a weapon! A-Are we in danger!?
P-Please be careful with that weapon! I-I wouldn't want anyone to get hurt.
I-I know a game like this can be stressful. So if anyone feels they need medical attention, please feel free to ask me.
If… If anyone starts to feel sick, I’m sure I can help. That’s what nurses are for, after all.
Uuu, I'm sorry if I sound nervous. I just really want this to go well.
Even t-though I-I'm not hurt anymore. I-I still wear these bandages because I find them... comforting. I-Is that weird?
Um, i-if you ever have trouble sleeping, try avoiding stimulants before you sleep, a-and try some light stretches. L-Little things like that can help with your sleep quality.
H-Has anyone read any good stories recently? I-I read a horror story I really enjoyed, hehe...
Um... um, um I-I went to the trouble of memorizing 5,000 different poker strategies. B-But now that we're playing, I-I can't remember any of them!
Hm... I wonder what sorts of drinks they have here. It's important to stay hydrated after all.
U-Um, there may be lots of things I'm not good at. B-But I'll do anything. S-So please let me know if you'd ever like some help.
U-Um, would anyone want me to buy them a drink? I-It would only be fair after you let me play this game with you.
W-We get our clothes back after the game, right? This isn't s-some type of trick?
T-This game is really fun. I-I'm glad none of you mind playing it with me.
If you're ever feeling sick, please don't come to a game like this. You'll only feel worse, and you'll put others at risk.
Ehehe, I-I'm usually out of a game like this pretty quickly. I-It's actually a little nice to play longer.
I-I went to the trouble of learning some poker tricks and strategies. B-But... right now, I-I really wish I could remember them.
U-Um, p-please let me know if I ever say anything weird or u-unnecessary. I-I wouldn't want to be a burden on all of you.
W-While I'm happy just to be here, um, there's a part of me which maybe... wants to... ah, strip more.
I-I may not be good at a lot of things, b-but I promise I'm good at nursing. I-I could never panic when a patient's life is my responsibility.
H-Huh? N-No, I can a-always control myself when a patient needs me!
U-Um, I would be happy to help... But, I-I think I may need some more information. W-What do you mean by "ship"? I-I've never really been on a boat before...
U-Um, while I would love to help you... I-I don't know who would run my school's infirmary instead of me. S-So... is there any way I could do both...?
Eeek! I'm sorry! I-I'll get to it right away! D-Do you also want some of my money?
A-Ahhh! Sorry, I-I'm sorry! I'll get right to it. W-Would you like me to buy you something as well?
I-I-I'm sorry for being a dweeb! P-Please don't pick on me here...!
I-I'm really sorry for being a dweeb. But please don't get violent...!
Y-You're right... I-I'm not good at much else besides nursing. I'm sorry...
I-It's true... I'm not very good at physical activities. I-I'm sorry... I'll try to be better.
I can't change it... T-This is the best it gets for someone like me...
I-I'm not useless! I-I could help you when you're sick... O-Or act as a coat rack for you. O-Or even a footstool if you needed one!
I-I'm sorry for being trash. P-Please don't remove me from the game...!
N-None... I-I swear! I-I would never let a patient die under my responsibility die like that!
I-I'm sorry, I'm really sorry! I-I don't have any gauze with me right now. W-Will bandages work for you?
H-Huh? I d-don't even think that's possible... Not while I'm... still alive, anyway.
I promise I'm not acting... I-I'm really sorry, b-but this is really... me.
None! Really! I-I'm always extra careful when it comes to keeping a patient alive!
Huh? N-Not... not really. I-I'm sorry if that i-isn't what you wanted to hear...
I-I'm sorry... I, um, I didn't c-choose my hair looking like this... N-Not that I mean to disagree with you!
U-Um... my primary work isn't with children. But if it was, I-I promise I'd give them the best care possible!
H-huh? I-I'm really sorry, but I-I don't really understand what you mean...
I-I know. I'm kind of... used to it. S-So I don't... really mind if y-you wanted to do it to.
Huh? Maybe I could give you a demonstration? W-Would that help?
W-What do you mean...? I'm not trying to h-hide anything... I swear!
Huh? I-I'm not trying to deceive you. T-This is how I really am. Please believe me!
I, um, I won't lie... having others notice me feels good... B-But please let me know if I'm taking away from the other players. I-I don't want to be a burden.
Um, while being noticed is definitely... nice. I-I wouldn't want to be a distraction from everyone else... I-If that's okay.
Um, I-I'm sorry! I-I know my strips have been disappointing. W-Would you be happier if I t-took off more clothes?
Ahh! I-I didn't think I'd run into someone from Hope's Peak here. I-I'm sorry you have to see me like this!
W-W-What is someone from Hope's Peak doing here!?
I knew my good luck would come to an end...
O-Oh right. I-It's my turn. I-I'm sorry, I almost forgot.
I don't know if I deserved to win anyway.
E-Even though I lost... I-It's a bit of a relief. All that winning was making me n-nervous.
O-Oh... I lost. Well, there's still next time... Right?
Y-Yeah... this is more what I'm used to...
I knew this would happen sooner or later.
I-I'll try my best... M-My very best, t-to not let you all down!
I-I'm kind of nervous. I-I'll try not to mess anything up.
Um, there's no need to worry about me. I've done stuff like this before.
Hehe, I... I think I'm starting to enjoy this more...
S-Something like this... I-It really doesn't bother me...
Um... I don't know if this will be enough to please everyone.
W-What? I-I didn't know my luck was so poor!
I-Is this some kind of trick... again?
I-Is this just bad luck? O-Or... N-No, none of y-you would do that to me... right?
I-I hope I don't trip!
Um, I-I hope seeing me go so many times doesn't get boring for all of you.
Uuu, I-It's not that I mind stripping in front of you all. But... I wouldn't mind some more time in between.
O-Oh, I'm stripping again... Well, if you say so.
I guess I have poor luck as well...
U-Um... I-I know just my a-apron isn't enough... But I’m not ready to take off more, s-sorry.
I-I feel odd. Every loss brings m-me closer to… that. B-But I don’t feel as nervous a-as I thought I would...
I-I should have expected this. I-I’m not very good at games… H-Honestly, I-I’m surprised it took this long...
I-I’m actually a little relieved to take this off. I-Is that w-weird?
Um, this i-isn't the first time I-I've done something like this. B-But something about it feels different... Better.
Please don’t hate me for taking so long to untie this! I’ll... I’ll be quicker next time, I swear!
O-Oh, I’m sorry. You didn't want to hear me go on like that…
Just a little longer now…
O-Only because I-It’s a little tight since I-I bought the wrong size… again. T-That’s all...
Ehehe, t-this is all of me… What do you think?
I-It wouldn't be good if you got dirty... So be careful where you leave that afterward.
Huh... It's not me...? Ahhh! N-Not that I'm happy that you lost!
Um, I-I'm sorry that you lost. B-But, um, there's always next time, right?
I-I can see it in your face! Y-You're mad at me right now!
I-I... I know winning is supposed to feel good. B-But I just feel more worried now!
E-Even though I won, I-I feel a bit... disappointed. I-I don't know why though...
Are you finding this, um, fun?
I-I guess you're okay with stripping. O-Or you wouldn't have come to a game like this... Right?
S-Someone always has to lose... I think it's a little cruel.
W-What do you mean by that...?
I hope you don't mean anything bad...
I-I wonder if you could show me your games, ~name~. I-I had a friend who did that once.
Are you a nurse too, ~name~? Would you like to talk about your experience? I-I could tell mine as well.
I-I didn't expect to run into another medic here. It feels... kind of nice.
I-It's my fault you have to remove that... S-Should I strip instead?
(Now she'll target me!)
I-I don't usually get to watch others strip... It's, um, a-a bit weird.
Um, are you mad at me for not losing instead of you...?
S-Someone had to lose. I-I'm sorry it wasn't me...
I-I really didn't mean for you to lose! P-Please believe me!
You didn't lose that one on purpose... Did you?
I-In a game like this, even losing can be fun. Ah! N-Not that I'm happy you lost...
U-Um, good luck next time, ~name~.
D-Do men usually wear clothes like that? N-Not that I have a problem with it.
Um, i-isn't it true that good things are better when they come in smaller pieces?
I-Is going slow like that what you're supposed to do...?
O-Oh... I was hoping for a bit more... B-But this is fine too,
I-I'm not very good at this game... B-But a small item seems like a smart choice.
Y-You can take your time if you want... I-I don't think you need to rush if you don't want to.
J-Just that...? I-It isn't much, but I won't complain.
Y-You... You don't have to worry about me being distracted...
It's alright if you want to take things at your pace. I-I don't mind.
Um, b-be careful not to drop something small like that. O-Or you may not find it...
Um, we should continue, right?
D-Does it feel nice to take that off?
M-Maybe I should have worn something like that.
W-We should continue, um, if it's alright with you, that is.
I-I'll keep going, so just take off whatever you want.
E-Even if you're just teasing me... It doesn't bother me when I'm doing this.
Um, I think that's enough for me right now.
I-I hope you're able to find that after the game. W-With everyone taking off their clothes. I-It should get pretty messy, right?
W-Wow, that really fits you. I-I could never pull off something like that.
Um, just because something isn't exciting, d-doesn't mean it isn't memorable, right?
Huh! But then... w-why didn't you... I-I don't understand this at all!
Good things are better when they last longer... right?
Um, you could just throw ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ on me if you'd like. I'm pretty useful you know! Hmhm.
E-Even unimportant things can feel good... when you're having fun, right?
I-I've never been good at picking out accessories. N-No one ever showed me how...
Could I, um, Could I have a closer look at that? O-Only if you wouldn't mind.
I-I wonder if I could something like that... O-Of course, it looks much better on you, then me.
It, um, it feels a little strange that you're t-taking such a small item off... When I've already... l-lost.
I-Is that all your taking off? W-Well, Okay...
~Clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ pretty. But, um, y-you still look nice without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
(I wonder if ~name~ prefers a certain type of bandage.)
I-I'm sorry you have to do this... B-But I-I'm pretty sure that's a smart choice...
I...I,um, I can't think think of anything to say. S-Sorry I didn't study more conversation topics.
Y-You're not worried about removing that in front of someone like me, are you?
H-have you ever played a game like this, ~name~?
~Clothing.ifPlural(are your|is your)~ dusty? A-Ah I-I guess it doesn't matter either way, s-sorry.
O-Oh! We're moving on!? I-I'm sorry, I got distracted.
L-Let me know if that ever gets damaged. Um, I'm not very good with clothes.. B-But I'm sure I could find someone talented at Hope's peak to help!
W-Would you like to talk more after the game, ~name~? I-It could be about whatever you want. O-Or nothing at all. E-Either way is fine with me.
I know I have no right to say this, but... I was hoping for a bit more...
W-Was that an odd thing to say? A-Are you mad at me, ~name~?
S-Sorry... it's hard to focus on the conversation when I'm... like this.
W-Won't everyone be upset with just that?
Y-You're okay with stripping? Y-You don't want me to go instead? O-Or my money?
I-Is something like that, um, popular where you come from?
(I hope ~name~ is enjoying this....)
I-I wonder if my classmates at H-Hope's Peak would enjoy this. I-I'm not really sure.
Um, ah... I-I'm sorry! I-I can't think of a good word to describe your ~clothing~.
I-I don't mean to be rude, ~target~. But are taking weight loss seriously?
M-Maybe we could talk some more after the game, ~name~. Ah! N-Not that I'd be so presumptuous to think w-we're actually friends!
S-Should we continue? I-I suppose it's up to you...
S-Sorry... Was that a weird thing to say?
Y-Yes... It's best to take it in small steps, right?
W-When I played something like this before... I'd have to strip e-even if I won. S-So thank you for not doing that.
L-Let me know if you want me to do anything. I-I'm not good at much. B-But besides dying, I'll do anything.
I... I don't mean to be rude, but I was hoping for a bit more...
U-Um, you still look pretty even w-without that, ~name~.
Y-You... You're going to get naked too, r-right, ~name~?
I-If you want, I could look away. I-I really don't mind.
(Everyone else is looking... But is it really okay for me to?)
I-I'm sorry its come this far. I-It's all my fault!
Ah, t-that's a lot... I-I hope you're not to upset you're the one taking that much off instead of me.
R-Right in front of me...!?
You make it look so easy... I-Is it easy for you?
Y-You... You look pretty good, ~name~. I-I hope you don't mind me saying.
I-I hope I'm ready for this...
D-Do you want me to turn away? I w-wouldn't have any problem doing that.
W-What!? O-Oh, I-I was so nervous, I didn't notice you finished.
I... I didn't practice what I'm supposed to say for something like this!
Ehehe. A game like this can be pretty fun, right?
W-Wow... I-I think you look even better like that, ~name~. I-If you don't mind me saying.
Should... should I take something off in return?
I-I wonder if you prefer stripping yourself? O-Or watching others do it...
Y-You're so close... I-I'm getting a little excited.
Ehehe... What are you planning next...?
Ahhh! W-What are you doing!?
N-No... I-I don't want to be shot. P-Please don't hit me!
Please be careful when exposing so much skin around these weapons. I-It could be a safety hazard
D-Doing this around all these weapons... I-I makes me a bit scared.
I would recommend sanitizing that before wearing it again. Um, it's best to be safe.
Um, It probably feels a little weird to remove so much in front of us, r-right, ~name~?
O-Oh no... I-I don't want to be the reason you lose...
Y-You don't have many chances left... Um, I think you should try to be careful.
Y-You're removing your ~clothing~ before me!? I-I promise I'm not cheating!
Am I... ahead of you? Y-You're not trying to lose... Are you?
Heh... heheheheh. S-Sorry for laughing so suddenly. T-This just makes me so happy!
(The way they look at her... Is it different from how they looked at me?)
Ehehe... I-I hope you don't mind the attention.
O-Oh ~target~... I'm sorry...
I-I didn't notice before... Y-Your... I'm sorry, ~target~.
I-I know you seem to be very skilled. But please don't do that again. I-I don't want to see you hurt someone.
U-Um. P-Please don't do something like that again! Y-You may hurt yourself!
(Would it be ruder to tell her? Or not to?)
Um, ~target~? I-I can... n-never mind.
That's a bit more then I was expecting. N-Not that it's a problem o-of course.
Um, let me know if you feel too cold after that. I-It wouldn't be good if you caught a cold.
I-I'm ahead of you. So why... why aren't you mad at me...?
I-If you want, you could let me hold onto your ~clothing~. I-It's cleaner than leaving it on the floor, right?
S-Something like this... I-I think it'll get easier the more you do it, ~name~.
E-Everything's happening so quickly. I-I hope I can keep up.
Y-You don't have to listen to me. But I-I wouldn't mind if you took off more clothes like that.
Don't overwork yourself! If you start to feel overwhelmed or stressed. Please let me know!
A-Are they going to compare us...?
Um, w-would it be a problem if I l-looked?
I-I'm more used to seeing this in a hospital. I-It's a little strange for me to see it... here.
U-Um, thank you for doing this.
Um, I think you can learn a lot about a person's physical habits by looking at their chest.
I've been looking forward to this... I-Is that w-weird?
T-This game can be pretty fun, right?
Ehehe... You can go now
A-A man's chest is nice... I-I don't get many chances to... appreciate them.
It makes me happy to see someone take such good care of their body.
W-Wow... You really went a-above and beyond, ~name~.
I-I don't mean to pry but have you been taking care of yourself? You look a bit underweight.
You're so toned... I-It's nice you take good care of your body.
Huh, it looks different from an anatomy chart.
Um, i-it must feel a little odd with everyone looking at you... right?
O-Oh good... You're looking healthy.
Ehehe, I-I'm sorry for laughing so suddenly. I-It's just... this is something I don't appreciate very often.
U-Um! Thank you... for your hard work.
( I think touching it would feel, really, really nice.)
I-I wonder how it would it feel... Y-Your chest against mine...
Ehehe... i wonder if you'd let me have a closer look...
If it makes it easier for you, just think of this as a p-physical examination...
W-Wait! D-Don't do it so quickly. I-I-I'm not ready for this yet!
I-I should have prepared myself better!
I-I'll try to keep myself calm...
E-Everyone's eyes are on you now...
Ah! I-It's coming out! I-I mean... n-never mind...
O-Oh... don't feel bad. I-Its size... doesn't really matter to me.
Um, I-It could actually be more... comfortable like that. S-So, um, there's a silver lining at least.
Um, I know many people worry about their... size. But since size is primarily influenced by genetics. You can't do much about it. I-It's better to worry about other things.
I-It's not the size but how you use it, r-right?
Ehehe... I-I think it's cute. I-If that's alright with you.
D-Does it grow when y-you're, um, you know, aroused?
D-Don't feel bad, ~name~. I-I don't think there is anything wrong with you...
S-Sometimes, I think b-being average i-isn't so bad...
(Nothing to be afraid of.)
Ah! D-Did it just move?
Ah, um... I-I'm not really sure what to say... I-I don't want you to be mad at me.
Ahh, I-Is it like that because of me...?
I-It's so... normal looking. N-Not that I dislike it, of course.
T-This is... exactly what I needed, ehehe.
I-I think I've seen one that looks just like that before.
O-Oh... I don't mean to offend. But I think that would be a little much for me...
That's, um, that's certainly impressive...
U-Um... congratulations? I-Is that the right thing to say?
Ahhh! T-To much! T-T-That's to much!
W-Wow. To see one that big. T-That's pretty rare.
Handling you... I-I think it would be a challenge... for most people, anyway...
W-While it is kind of... scary. I-I think I'd like to... try yours.
I-I, um, I like its shape if that m-makes sense.
Eeeek! N-No, S-Stay away from me! I-I don't wanna be burned again!
Ahhh! I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry! Please don't burn meee!
I-It's been a long time since I've seen this... I-I hope I'm ready.
Eeek I-I have so much, a-and you... you're almost done! H-How did this happen!?
A-Are you sure... A-Are you ready for this?
Sometimes... p-people can be adorable when they're embarrassed, right?
Ehehe... are you enjoying the attention?
E-Everyone looking at you... I-It feels good, right?
Hehe... Thank you very much for doing this.
Um... W-Would you like any help with that...?
My heart's pounding... I-I don't know if I'm nervous... or excited.
(She probably doesn't have to worry about her bra being too tight.)
Um, e-everyone here seems n-nice ... I don't think you should h-have to worry about your... size.
T-They really are small... D-Did I say that out loud? I-I'm so sorry! P-Please forgive me!
I hope y-you don't feel bad about your small chest... I-I don't think anyone here minds...
Um, I know yours are smaller than mine. B-But I promise they're better. I-I'm not lying.
(She probably doesn't have trouble finding the right size...)
S-size, um, doesn't really matter to me. I-I think they look nice either way...
Aww, they're so cute, ehehe. I-I really like them.
D-Don't worry, ~name~. T-Touching them feels good no matter your size, ehehe.
Um, i-if you're worried about your size... It's not uncommon for breasts to grow after puberty. At least until your 20's. A-After that, um, sorry.
(Don't annoy her, don't annoy her, don't annoy her...!)
O-Oh, they're um, well shaped.
Um, I think Pekoyama's are a similar size. N-Not that I stare at her...
I-I'm more comfortable with a smaller size. N-Not to say yours are bad at all.
T-They're such a nice size...
T-They're so perfectly shaped... Y-You wouldn't let me touch them. Right, ~name~?
(I think, ~name~ would sound cute if I touched those...)
That... That's a rather healthy size.
Many women with larger beasts often face back pain... Though this has also been correlated to other factors, such as an incorrect bra size.
Do... Do you ever feel people look at you differently, ~name~?
I-I... I'm sorry for staring! Unless you want me to...
L-Let me know if you ever experience back pain. I-I should be able to help...
Um, ~name~? W-What size b-bra do you wear? I-I'm not asking for any reason in particular...
T-Those look a bit much for me... B-But I'm sure they'd me someone happy!
You... You must get a lot of attention with those...
I-I know I should look away. But I can't!
Y-You didn't wear a-a bra? That seems a little... dangerous. B-But at least you're comfortable!
Y-You weren't wearing a bra? I-I didn't notice, I-I swear!
(I wonder if this is easy for them...)
O-Oh... They're... nice!
T-This is the part people look forward to, right?
(I've seen this before... It's okay.)
I-Ive seen something like this before. B-But it's still weird i-in a game like this.
I-I'm sorry it's gotten this far... W-Would you like me to go instead of you...?
Is it... wrong for me to be... excited? I-I don't want to upset you.
Ehehe, s-something about seeing this... I-It makes me feel better. I-Is that wrong?
I hope you enjoy doing this. T-That will make the game more fun for everyone... won't it?
W-Wow... T-This is more then I ever expected...
G-Go on... I-I'm sure you'll feel better after you do this.
I-Is this really fair? Shouldn't I have less...?
